entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
